short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to untranslate Reddit URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
redditUntranslate automatically cleans up Reddit URLs by removing the ?tl=xx query string parameter, effectively disabling the auto-translation feature. This ensures you view content in its original language without unwanted translations.

Whether you frequently browse international subreddits or just want to streamline your Reddit experience, redditUntranslate keeps your browsing free from automatic language adjustments, allowing you to enjoy Reddit exactly as intended.

Key Features:

    Automatically removes the ?tl=xx parameter from Reddit URLs.
    Disables auto translation, showing content in its original language.
    Lightweight and runs quietly in the background, with no setup required.

How It Works:
Simply install redditUntranslate, and it will automatically modify Reddit URLs as you browse, ensuring that you see the original, untranslated content every time.

Source code here :
https://github.com/SeidSmatti/redditUntranslate



Tags:  Reddit extension, language settings, Non-English Reddit users, Reddit language fix, Disable automatic translation
